product_name: BIC Sport Adjustible Stand Up Paddle - 2-Piece - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Dependable materials at a value price make this paddle a mainstay for recreational use and for those on a tight budget. Durable aluminum shaft includes high-visibility float.
